title: Potentially widespread connectivity issues
body:
Started around 6:00 PM aest when I was put offline with a trying to reconnect on the LoL client. Upon relogging this issue goes away and I can play as normal., From what I've been told by others, many may have been kicked off simultaneously. The issue doesn't occur in-game, only out of game client so far
Upon finishing a game I'm left with a "trying to reconnect" in the out of game client.
Not sure what may be causing the issue but it doesn't appear to be an isolated incident.


Edit: Because of this, I appear to have been deprived of my level 10 rewards on the account I was playing on. Which is a real bummer. If possible it'd be great to get the champ/skin/ward shards+orange essence on PrincessPete, assuming they resemble what's advertised on the wikia
